sdkmanager --install sources;android-30 --sdk_root=C:\Users\aquawicket\digitalknob\DK\3rdParty\android-sdk

sdkmanager --install system-images;android-29;default;x86_64 --sdk_root=C:\Users\aquawicket\digitalknob\DK\3rdParty\android-sdk
